title: Perfect Chicken Alfredo
directions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook
until golden and cooked through, 8 minutes per side.
Add milk, broth, and garlic to skillet. Season with salt
and pepper and bring to a simmer. Add fettuccine,
stirring frequently for about 3 minutes. Let cook until
Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan until combined.
Remove from heat and stir in sliced chicken. Garnish
